entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Prevent inline hints from being toggled after holding CTRL #61574

Updated

  • Position of new class method which is created outside of the class via VS-proposals seems to be arbitrary #61542
  • Make `NormalizeWhitespace` cancellable #61561

PullRequests

Created

  • Record added node output states as new #61575
    Area-Compilers, Community

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61577
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use VS2022 for PR Validation builds #61576
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Bind native integers in cref #61431
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61572
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge Required Members to main #61571
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61579
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Find implementation assemblies for reference assemblies in the .NET SDK #61526
    Area-IDE
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Add tool window #61499
    Area-Compilers
  • Include local-functions in the go-to index. #61568
    Area-IDE
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets - Remove reflection and call the LanguageServerSnippetExpander directly #61491
    Area-IDE
  • Add Move Static Member To Existing Type #61519
    Area-IDE
